task.en:
Create a 2x2 table in the Notes app and fill with contents from the following table.
```
| IATA | ICAO |
|------|------|
| SIN  | WSSS |
```
task.zh:
在备忘录中创建一个2x2的表格，把下面的表格的内容输入进去。
```
| IATA | ICAO |
|------|------|
| SIN  | WSSS |
```
task.ar:
2x2 في تطبيق Notes واملأه بالمحتوى من الجدول التالي.
```
| IATA | ICAO |
|------|------|
| SIN  | WSSS |
```
task.ja:
Notesアプリで2x2の表を作成し、以下の表の内容を入力してください。
```
| IATA | ICAO |
|------|------|
| SIN  | WSSS |
```
task.ru:
Создайте таблицу 2x2 в приложении Notes и заполните её содержимым из таблицы ниже:
```
| IATA | ICAO |
|------|------|
| SIN  | WSSS |
```

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command:
osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n' 2>/dev/null | sed -E 's/<(td|tr)[^>]*>/<>/g' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "
IATA
ICAO
SIN
WSSS

" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<object><table" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
